Text: Jennifer Bello is a recruiter for Sedona Consulting here in Houston She does financial and accounting recruiting She called me and I thought of your brother Her number is and email is Didnt know if he would be interested I also have that contact for the legal recruiters if you get in trouble Later Chris Paul Commercial Associate Duke Energy International Phone Fax Email

Thursday NightIn celebration of my birthday this weekend my brother and a good friend of mine are coming to Houston Thursday night through Sunday We are going straight to PF Changs on Westheimer from the airport and should be there no later than After dinner we will head over to Taco Milagro or similar for the rest of the night This is an open invitation to anyone who would like to meet us at either place My cell is if you want to get an update Hope to see you there and please feel free to pass this on Chris Paul Commercial Associate Duke Energy International Phone Fax Email
